Actions.Name: Get a private template
Actions.Description: Retrieves a private template by name.

Actions.Name: List private templates
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of all private templates.

Actions.Name: Transform private template
Actions.Description: Populates a private template with the data and returnes a fully populated Adaptive Card.

Actions.Name: Delete private template
Actions.Description: Removes a private template from the set of private templates.

Actions.Name: Update a private template
Actions.Description: Updates the contents of a private template.

Actions.Name: Find a public template
Actions.Description: Find a public template by analyzing the structure of your data.

Actions.Name: Get a public template
Actions.Description: Retrieves the contents of a public template.

Actions.Name: List public templates
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of all public templates.

Actions.Name: Transform public template
Actions.Description: Populates a public template with the data and returnes a fully populated Adaptive Card.

Actions.Name: Send Approval
Actions.Description: Sends an Approval Adaptive Card, and returns the response with the choice and fields entered.

Actions.Name: Send Adaptive Card
Actions.Description: Sends an Adaptive Card, and returns the response with the choice and fields entered.

Actions.Name: Send Message
Actions.Description: Sends an Adaptive Card as a message (no actions).
